title: Alessa’S Frills
alternative_title: Alessa's Flyers ; Alessa's Frills ; Alessa's Ruffles ; Frill of Alessa ; 알레사의 프릴
status: Alessa's Flyers ; Alessa's Frills ; Alessa's Ruffles ; Frill of Alessa ; 알레사의 프릴
description:
Description :
        "The rebel who destroyed everything of mine, I'm going to make her pay!" 

Alessa lost her parents and her hometown to the rebels and lived only for revenge. While arresting Empress Floria, the leader of the rebels, she was stabbed and suddenly went back in time 10 years, to the day her master Zikbel was murdered. This was the will of Latzin, the god of fate. He ordered her to change the past, save Zikbel and eliminate the rebels. 

But something went wrong. Why is Floria's voice in your head? "Kyaa! Alessa, you are so amazing! Perfect, elegant and beautiful!" And on top of that, she's your number one fan?! 

Two returns to the past, the secret feelings that echo in their minds. Everything is related to Floria. Is this innocent and fun-loving girl your enemy or your destiny? Knight Alessa and her devoted fan Floria embark on a secret mission to change the future and protect their love!
